title: The Raging Quiet
description: Marnie and Raver are both outsiders. Each is set apart from the community around them: Marnie because she is a newcomer, having been brought to the seaside village by her new – and much older – husband; and Raver because he is the village lunatic.The distrust surrounding Marnie increases when her husband suddenly dies. Her subsequent isolation pushes her towards Raver – and an important discovery: the villagers have mistaken his deafness for madness.The two outsiders soon develop a rudimentary sign language. But their precious new friendship is cut short when the villagers misconstrue their strange, private communication, and put Marnie on trial for witchcraft . . .
author: Sherryl Jordan
